post_title: FS: HOF & Other rare backs (Broad Leaf, Cycle, EPDG, Polar Bear)
post_content:
Have some extra higher end HOFers and others that I am willing to part with that are not part of my core HOF set. 

I created an album on my Flickr so you can see the scans - [URL="https://flic.kr/s/aHBqjCipLH"]HERE[/URL]

- T206 Tris Spear Cycle 350 PSA 4.5 ($10k) 
- T206 WAJO Hands at Chest Polar Bear PSA 5 ($6,600)
- T206 Vic Willis St. Lous w/ Bat Polar Bear PSA 5 ($800)
- T206 Clark Griffith Batting Polar Bear PSA 5 ($750
- T206 Jake Pfiester Seated Broad Leaf PSA 3 ($4k) 
[STRIKE]- T206 Mike Donlin Seated EPDG PSA 5 [/STRIKE] SOLD
- T206 Rube Marquard Follow Through Cycle 460 PSA 4.5 ($1750) 
[STRIKE]- T206 Cy Young Bare Hands Old Mill PSA 3 [/STRIKE] SOLD

Let me know of any questions! 

Thanks, Kyle
